steps.title: Navigate to https://www.hoodamath.com/games/growisland.html in a web browser.
steps.content: Navigate to https://www.hoodamath.com/games/growisland.html in a web browser. This is the website where you can play Grow Island. You need to Install the Adobe Flash Player in order to play Grow Island.

steps.title: Allow Adobe Flash Player to access your web browser.
steps.content: Allow Adobe Flash Player to access your web browser. If you see a grey screen that says "Select for Adobe Flash" or "Run Adobe Flash", click the center of the screen. A pop-up window will appear. Click the tab that says "Allow" or "Allow Once". If you are using Google Chrome, you will need to Enable Flash in the Settings menu.

steps.title: Click English.
steps.content: Click English . If you can't read the text on the screen, click English or the language of your choice.

steps.title: Click Play.
steps.content: Click Play . It's in the center of the screen. The game will begin.

steps.title: Click on the “Mechanical Engineering” icon.
steps.content: Click on the “Mechanical Engineering” icon. This is the icon located to the far right that resembles a bolt. A single bolt will appear on the island. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Click on the “Civil Engineering” icon.
steps.content: Click on the “Civil Engineering” icon. It's the icon that resembles a pickaxe. A little man will use the pickaxe to construct a road on the island, and the bolt will grow and change shape.

steps.title: Click on the “Architecture” icon.
steps.content: Click on the “Architecture” icon. It's the icon that resembles a pile of logs. The little man will use a paving machine, the evolution of the bolt, to pave the dirt road. The logs will be placed on the cliffs on the right side of the island.

steps.title: Click on the “Aeronautics” icon.
steps.content: Click on the “Aeronautics” icon. It's the icon that resembles a steering wheel. The little man in the machine will use a sword to carve a dock on the left side of the island. [2] X Research source A small house with another person will appear on the right side of the island. Lastly, a single smoke will come out of the volcano.

steps.title: Click on the “Environmental Engineering” icon.
steps.content: Click on the “Environmental Engineering” icon. It's the icon that resembles a red smokestack. The little man will come out of the machine after having seen the person in front of the house, and he will build a river behind the house in order to grow flowers. He will then offer some to the woman living in the home. An automobile will emerge from the steering wheel next to the dock and start driving on the paved road, while the home, with the two people inside, grows larger in size. A chimney has also appeared next to the volcano.

steps.title: Click on the “Electrical Engineering” icon.
steps.content: Click on the “Electrical Engineering” icon. It's the icon that resembles a red and white battery. It will spawn in the middle of the road. The house will get upgraded, and a fence will appear behind it. The two people will come out of their home with a child. One of them will throw something in the chimney and then bulldoze a tunnel into the mountain. A ship will emerge and go to the island in the background to retrieve a yellow potion, after that it will return to the dock. At the end, the screen shakes a little and the volcano produces some more smoke.

steps.title: Click on the “Computer Science” icon.
steps.content: Click on the “Computer Science” icon. It's the icon that resembles a microchip. A computer will appear near the top of the island. [3] X Research source A railroad will be built through the tunnel. A rocket ship will also appear on the island, and it will go to space to retrieve a blue potion, similar to the one the ship got. A smaller battery will come out from the one that was in the middle of the roads, and it will turn the car into an electric one. One of the people and the child, who have now a picnic area behind their house, will throw something else into the chimney. Lastly, the volcano will erupt, with a dog with a plant-shaped hat will emerging from it. A little bit of lava will come out from its hat and fall down the hill.

steps.title: Click on the “Applied Chemistry” icon.
steps.content: Click on the “Applied Chemistry” icon. It's the icon that resembles a Bunsen burner. The little man will enjoy a picnic lunch with his family while the island’s technology continues to improve. You have now achieved maximum points, and have beat Grow Island. [4] X Research source

steps.title: Wait for the regular Ending to appear.
steps.content: Wait for the regular Ending to appear. A congratulations message will appear on screen.

steps.title: Click Play.

steps.title: Click on the “Aeronautics” icon.
steps.content: Click on the “Aeronautics” icon. It's the icon that resembles a steering wheel. A steering-wheel landing pad will appear on the left side of the island. [6] X Research source

steps.title: Click on the “Civil Engineering” icon.
steps.content: Click on the “Civil Engineering” icon. It's the icon that resembles a pickaxe. A little man will use the pickaxe to create a dirt road.

steps.title: Click on the “Architecture” icon.
steps.content: Click on the “Architecture” icon. It's the icon that resembles a pile of logs. A small pile of logs will appear on the right side of the island.

steps.title: Click on the “Computer Science” icon.
steps.content: Click on the “Computer Science” icon. It's the icon that resembles a microchip. A computer will appear near the top of the island. A woman and her home will replace the pile of logs.

steps.title: Click on the “Electrical Engineering” icon.
steps.content: Click on the “Electrical Engineering” icon. It's the icon that resembles a red and white battery. A battery will appear near the dirt road. The man will build a river behind the house.

steps.title: Click on the “Mechanical Engineering” icon.
steps.content: Click on the “Mechanical Engineering” icon. It's the icon that resembles a bolt. The home will grow larger. The man will cut away a series of trees located to the left of the home.

steps.title: Click on the “Applied Chemistry” icon.
steps.content: Click on the “Applied Chemistry” icon. It's the icon that resembles a Bunsen burner. A Bunsen burner will appear on the island. An alien ship will turn the man into a green alien. The house will also be converted into an alien-like space home.

steps.title: Click on the “Environmental Engineering” icon.
steps.content: Click on the “Environmental Engineering” icon. It's the icon that resembles a smokestack. A group of aliens will teleport onto the dirt road, and start dancing. You have now achieved maximum points for the UFO ending, and have beat Grow Island.

steps.title: Wait for the UFO Ending to appear.
steps.content: Wait for the UFO Ending to appear. A congratu-alien-s message will appear on screen.
